name: slow_and_steady
title: Slow and Steady
author: darkstorm2150
description:
Embrace the Journey, Not Just the Destination

Rediscover the joy of railroading in Factorio with Slow and Steady, the innovative mod that transforms your train experience.

Key Features
Realistic Train Speeds: Experience the thrill of a more leisurely pace, where the journey becomes just as important as the destination.

Enhanced Realism: Locomotives now heavier, more powerful, and resilient, but with a more realistic top speed.
Cargo & Fluid Wagons: Increased weight and capacity, with enhanced health, to simulate the challenges and rewards of hauling heavier loads.

Immersive Railroading Experience: Focus on the journey, not just the rapid transportation, and discover a new level of engagement with your Factorio world.
